revised_title: Royal Society Memberships and Obituaries in 1972
tldr: This article from the Royal Society's Notes and Records highlights obituaries of several members and announces the election of new fellows in 1972. Notable individuals include Stanley Fabes Dorey, John Hutchinson, and Maurice Ewing, who were recognized for their contributions to fields such as biophysics, crystallography, and geophysics.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Biographies and Book Reviews
